profile.name: Muhammad Muzamil Hussain
profile.aboutMe: As a recent graduate software engineer, I bring a diverse skill set and a passion for DevOps. With significant understanding of DevOps and Cloud Computing Concepts, I offer a comprehensive understanding of industry-standard practices and the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). My proficiency extends to my diverse experience such as working with full stack web applications.

skill: Cloud Platforms: AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Azure
DevOps Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform
Project Management tools such as Jira, Asana

experience.description: Engaged in DevOps principles and best practices, including automation, continuous integration, and continuous delivery, through hands-on learning and practical assignments. Assisted in streamlining development and deployment workflows, enhancing my understanding of the software development lifecycle and the importance of collaboration between development and operations teams.

As a Full Stack Intern, I had the opportunity to work on frontend development, creating image-highlights and call-to-action sections in VueJS for swell.is ecommerce storefronts. Also worked on React JS components and libraries. Implemented Docker-related DevOps practices to streamline development workflows and improve deployment efficiency. Integrated CI/CD pipelines to enhance code integration and testing processes. Created wireframes for mobile app on Invision Freehand and dashboard design on Figma. Managed user stories, functional requirements, and related tasks for incoming projects.

volunteer.description: Greenpeace is an independent global campaigning network that acts to change attitudes and behaviour, to protect and conserve the environment and to promote peace. It comprises 26 independent national/regional Greenpeace organisations with presence in over 55 countries across Europe, Africa, the Americas, Asia and the Pacific, as well as a coordinating and supporting organisation, Greenpeace International.

project.name: Image-Highlights and Call-to-Action Section

project.name: React JS Components and Libraries
project.description: Developed various React JS components and libraries for enhancing the functionality and UI/UX of web applications.
